properties.Text: Q03. Awareness about, and interest in, APCNF and PMDS and practice
3.1. When did you know about APCNF: [year]
3.2.How do you know about APCNF (multiple answers possible; do not read options. probe and tap the Switch to Select or Unselect  against the stated or appropriate input or practice)
3.3. Did you enrol yourself with RySS 2022-23 or earlier years?
3.4. If no, reasons for not enrolling with RySS (multiple answers possible; do not read options; probe and tap the Switch to Select or Unselect against appropriate option)
3.4.1. Do not know how to enrol
3.4.6. Dont have time for CNF processes
3.5. When you started using APCNF inputs/ practices in your fields: [year]

3.6. What APCNF inputs and practices you have adopted in 2022-23 (multiple answers are possible; do not read options; probe and tap the Switch to Select or Unselect against the stated or appropriate input or practice)
3.7. Are you using APCNF inputs, along with agrochemicals on your entire operational area?
3.8. If no, you are doing now or planning to do
3.8.1. Using APCNF inputs in a particular plot or area every year
3.8.2. Using APCNF inputs in different plots or areas in rotation year after year
3.8.3. Increasing area or plots under APCNF inputs year after year
